# Module Dropchance Calculator
This script will calculate the current dropchance, peak dropchance, and dropchance per second.

## Requirements
1 script, 1 conditions, 2 impulse, and 15 lines unlocked in the Facility AI for the main script.

1 script, 0 conditions, 1 impulse, and 9 lines unlocked in the Facility AI for the minimal script.

## How to Use
Set `dropchancefactor` to your dropchance factor. This information can be found in town stats. Default is 1.0.

Set `basemoduledropchance` to the base dropchance of the module. This information can be found in the wiki or with the treasure map exotic skill. Default is 0.01 or 1%.

Set `difficulty` to the difficulty of the tower testing run. Default is "easy".

Press the key `b` to start/stop the script.

**Do not change the impulse unless you know what you're doing! Some parts of the script depend on the current impulses.**

## Import Codes
`dropchance_calculator`
1 script, 1 conditions, 15 lines
```

```

`dropchancecalculatormini` (OUTDATED. Update pending)

This is a variant of the script without a toggle. 1 script, 0 conditions, 9 lines
